user_query: I'm planning to invest in precious metals and need the latest rates for gold, silver, and platinum. Can you provide me with the rates in USD for each metal? Additionally, I would like to compare the historical rates of silver and platinum between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest rates for gold, silver, and platinum in USD.
Fetch the historical rates of silver between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
Fetch the historical rates of platinum between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
Compare the historical rates of silver and platinum for the specified period.
